name: hugo-photo-gallery
description: Photo Gallery theme for websites built with hugo (http://gohugo.io). Edit
author: Levi Segal <segal.levi@gmail.com>

scripts.theme: cd exampleSite/themes/hugo-photo-gallery && git pull origin master && git pull origin develop && git checkout develop
scripts.push: git push origin master --follow-tags && git push origin develop --follow-tags
